author: thelabdude
msg: SOLR-6447: bin/solr should pass -DnumShards=1 for bootstrapping collection1 when starting in cloud mode

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-7889 : txnMgr should be session specific (Alan Gates via Ashutosh Chauhan)

author: kwall
msg: QPID-6066: [Java Client] 0-8..0-9-1 only - Add system property to allow call to exchange.bound during AMQSession#getQueueDepth to be omitted
This prevents interoperabiliy problem with older Java Brokers, and gives users a change to restore old behaviour (AMQChannelException in the event
that the queue does not exist) if desired.

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-5760 : Add vectorized support for CHAR/VARCHAR data types (Matt McCline via Jason Dere)
